'''Skorupi''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''スコルピ''' ''Scorpi'') is a dual-type {{2t|Poison|Bug}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation IV]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s into {{p|Drapion}} starting at [[level]] 40.

==Biology==
Skorupi resembles an over-sized, pale purple scorpion. Its claws and tail have been swapped, giving it two stingers and a claw tail. The miniature jaws, claws, and tail claws are white. Its arms are attached directly to its head, close to its teal eyes. A pointed marking joins its eyes. The head, arms, two tail segments, and all four legs are light blue, while the body, tail end, and other two tail segments are a darker shade of blue.

It buries itself in sand and lies in wait for unsuspecting prey, gripping it with its tail claws and injecting poison; it will then hold on until the poison takes effect. Skorupi is found in deserts and dry areas like [[Reversal Mountain]], though it can be found in marshy areas such as the [[Great Marsh]].

==In the anime==
[[File:Team Flare Skorupi.png|thumb|left|250px|Skorupi in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
Skorupi debuted in ''[[DP099|A Trainer and Child Reunion!]]'', under the ownership of {{EF|Aaron}}.

Multiple Skorupi appeared in ''[[XY094|From A to Z!]]'', ''[[XY102|Meeting at Terminus Cave!]]'', ''[[XY107|An Explosive Operation!]]'', and ''[[XY132|A Towering Takeover!]]'', all under the ownership of {{tc|Team Flare Grunt}}s.

===Minor appearances===
A {{pkmn|Coordinator}}'s Skorupi appeared in ''[[DP114|Another One Gabites the Dust!]]'', where it was seen participating in the [[Appeal|Performance Stage]] of the {{to|Chocovine}} {{pkmn|Contest}}.

A Skorupi was seen at the [[Shelter Town]]'s [[Pokémon Center]] in ''[[DP125|Battling a Cute Drama!]]''.

A Skorupi appeared in ''[[DP140|Historical Mystery Tour!]]''.

==In the manga==
[[File:Skorupi Adventures.png|thumb|left|115px|Skorupi in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
In ''[[PS364|A Skuffle with Skorupi]]'', {{adv|Platinum}} tried to catch a Skorupi in the [[Great Marsh]], but she failed and it fled.

[[Team Rocket Elite Trio|Ken]]'s Skorupi first appeared in ''[[PS457|All About Arceus VI]]''.

==Trivia==
* Skorupi is the only Pokémon to have its {{t|Bug}} type changed upon evolution.
* Skorupi is the only Pokémon with the {{2t|Bug|Poison}} combination to have Poison as its primary type.

===Origin===
Skorupi is based on a {{wp|scorpion}}. It has some characteristics that resemble a {{wp|Thelyphonida|vinegarroon}}, a similar arachnid. Its {{egg|Water 3}} Egg Group designation may be a reference to the ancient group of arthropods known as {{wp|Eurypterid|sea scorpions}} that used to inhabit the oceans and may have been the ancestors of modern scorpions.

====Name origin====
Skorupi and Scorpi are a shortening of ''{{wp|scorpion}}''.
